testcase.name: User logs into the system
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on login page.............................................passed When The user enters valid details..........................................passed And The user clicks on captcha..............................................passed And The user clicks on login button.........................................passed Then The user is navigated to dashboard.....................................passed

testcase.classname: feature to test adding new contact functionality
testcase.name: Add new contacts
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on dashboard..............................................passed And User clicks on the new contact button...................................passed When user clicks on choose contact dropdown field and selects the new contact.passed And User adds valid inputs..................................................passed And User selects checkboxes as needed.......................................passed Then The user clicks on the save changes button.............................passed

testcase.name: User creates an account
testcase.system-out: Given The user is on registration page......................................passed When The user inputs valid details..........................................passed And The user selects captcha................................................passed And User clicks on register button..........................................passed Then navigated to dashboard.................................................passed
